extendedInfo.description: Become the catapultâ¦Take down forts, castles and even a fire-breathing dragon in Catapult Kingâthe King of castle crushers! Rescue the Princess and defeat the enemy in this beautiful, 3D fantasy adventure. **Runs beautifully on tablets**â¢ ONCE UPON A TIMEPrincesses are constantly getting themselves kidnapped by dragons and this one is no different. Now it's up to you to get her back using your arsenal of cannonballs and power-ups. â¢ SMASH THE NASTY KNIGHTSThe Nasty Knights are helping the Dragon keep the Princess captive. Teach them a lesson in 96 fun and challenging Levels.â¢ POWER-UP YOUR 'PULTComplete Levels to earn magic, then use this to enchant your Catapult. You can give your Catapult a line of sight for accuracy, use the Earth Shock to blast the bad guys away, or call in a devastating Lunar Strike!

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Creative and fun. Graphics are excellent looks great on note 2. Give me a quit/exit option and I\'ll rate 5 stars.
reviews.author: Hvy HitR

reviews.title: Fun however...
reviews.comment: Works flawlessly on GALAXY S3. even connected it to Facebook and Twitter with no problems. Doesn\'t force close at all. My only problem is that you cannot exit the game from the back button. There is no quit option in the game.
reviews.author: Sosavere MC

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: I played this game on my iPad and loved it now playing it on my LG optimus now and it works great. Much better on the iPad though bc of the bigger screen
reviews.author: Chelsie Matthis

reviews.title: Nice but...
reviews.comment: No doubt it\'s a fun game. The problem is you can\'t exit game with back button and worst, every couple level played an ad pops up and the game has to reload. Very freaking annoying! Fix and I\'ll up my stars...
reviews.author: Daniel Patenaude

reviews.title: Awsome
reviews.comment: Best game app ever. Better than Angry Birds anyday.
reviews.author: Willie Sweat

reviews.title: Nice game
reviews.comment: This game is koo, but its been forever since a update. I beat the first 90 somethin levels a month ago, any still no update!
reviews.author: Floyd Lee

reviews.title: Ads of doom!
reviews.comment: As others have said, after a couple levels, an ad pops up and the game shuts down. What\'s the deal?
reviews.author: Russ Lavigne

reviews.title: Its cool.
reviews.comment: Its a ok game, when r u guys going to update?
reviews.author: Jaime Andrade

reviews.title: Needs an ad free paid version
reviews.comment: But it still beats boring Stupid Birds.  Excellent game. It comes with 96 free levels and people are complaining there\'s not enough. How ungrateful and greedy can you get?!
reviews.author: Jim Williams

reviews.title: Better then angry birds!
reviews.comment: Finally I was looking for a game like this its like a 3d angry birds love all your game BTW and keep it up
reviews.author: Daniel Parker

reviews.title: Great Game but.......
reviews.comment: I have to agree in regards of exiting and ads. But I can live with it. Its a great game however the fun only lasts for so long. I have been waiting for quite some time for new levels that were aught to come \"soon.\" Not waiting anymore. Just taking up space on my phone. Uninstalling :(
reviews.author: Gina Marrelli

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: My 5 year son love it he wants more levels thank you best game
reviews.author: tearle lankford

reviews.title: Love it but.....
reviews.comment: I would have given five stars because the game is ridiculously fun and the graphics are amazing but it is annoying waiting each time I open it due to the scene at the beginning. Also it freezes quite often and I have to hold down the home button and exit it through the task bar.
reviews.author: Connie McGee

reviews.title: Good game but.......
reviews.comment: Its a good game fun amd easy bit every time I try and play it freezes and I have to close amd wait at least an hour to try again and then it freezes again fix it and will gibe it 5 stars
reviews.author: antonio mata

reviews.title: A gr8 game!
reviews.comment: Works flawlessly on my Droid RAZR HD.  If you are a fan of Angry Birds, you will love this!  This will push AB\'s to take their game to the next level.
reviews.author: Dave Roberts

reviews.title: Ummmmm
reviews.comment: This could be one awesome game if it didn\'t freeze on me every now and then....
reviews.author: Mike Martinez

reviews.title: keep receiving an error message
reviews.comment: everytime I try to sync my facebook account, it kicks me off and with an error message... help please
reviews.author: Jack Stewart III

reviews.title: Fun game
reviews.comment: But every time I connect to Facebook it tells me to hit the back button to return to the game and freezes when back button is pressed. Then I have to back out to my home page and use an app killer to kill the app other wise when I try to open the game back up it\'s still frozen on the same screen it was at when I exited the game
reviews.author: Matthew Perry

reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.comment: At first it was working but then it just stopped working on my new android 4g
reviews.author: Nick Reed
